Package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.specificationproperties

package org.odpi.openmetadata.frameworks.openmetadata.specificationproperties
The specification properties are used to describe the requirements for using/running templates, governance actions and connectors.
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    ActionTargetType
    ActionTargetType characterises a type of element that the linked governance service/governance action works with when it runs.
    AnalysisStepType
    AnalysisStepType describes an analysis step of a survey action service it is part of the metadata to help tools understand the operations of a service.
    AnnotationTypeType
    AnnotationTypeType describes an annotation type of survey action service.
    ConfigurationPropertyType
    ConfigurationPropertyType characterises one of the configuration parameters supported by a specific connector.
    GuardType
    GuardType describes a guard.
    PlaceholderProperty
    PlaceholderProperty characterises one of the placeholder properties used in a template.
    PlaceholderPropertyType
    PlaceholderPropertyType characterises one of the placeholder properties used in a template.
    ProducedActionTarget
    ProducedActionTarget characterises one of the action targets that this governance service sets up to pass on to any follow-on steps in a governance action process that it is a part of.
    ProducedAnnotationType
    ProducedAnnotationType describes an annotation type of survey action service.
    ProducedGuard
    GuardType describes a guard.
    ProducedRequestParameter
    ProducedRequestParameter characterises one of the request parameters that this governance service sets up to pass on to any follow-on steps in a governance action process that it is a part of.
    ReplacementAttribute
    ReplacementAttribute characterises one of the attribute values that should be provided when using a specific template.
    ReplacementAttributeType
    ReplacementAttributeType characterises one of the attribute values that should be provided when using a specific template.
    RequestParameterType
    RequestParameterType characterises one of the request parameters supported by a specific governance service.
    RequestTypeType
    RequestTypeType characterises one of the governance request types supported by a specific governance service.
    SpecificationProperty
    SpecificationProperty characterises one of the specification properties used to explain to a caller how to use a template, or a connector.
    SupportedActionTarget
    SupportedActionTarget characterises one of the types of open metadata element supported by a specific governance service or governance action.
    SupportedAnalysisStep
    SupportedAnalysisStep describes an analysis step of a survey action service it is part of the metadata to help tools understand the operations of a service.
    SupportedConfigurationProperty
    SupportedConfigurationProperty characterises one of the configuration parameters supported by a specific connector.
    SupportedRequestParameter
    SupportedRequestParameter characterises one of the request parameters supported by a specific governance service or governance action.
    SupportedRequestType
    SupportedRequestTypeType characterises one of the governance request types supported by a specific governance service.
    SupportedTemplate
    SupportedTemplate defines a template supported by the linked element (typically a connector or governance action).
    TemplateType
    SupportedTemplate defines a template supported by the linked element (typically a connector or governance action).
